title: zkStudyClub - ARC: Accumulation for Reed-Solomon Codes (William Wang, NYU)

Define what an interactive reduction is
so an interactive reduction is from one

and it's an interactive protocol between

receives some statement and the verifier
receives the the instance and they

original statement was in the relation
then the new statement will be in the
new
relation and the second property is

original statement is not in the
language then the new statement will
also not be in the language with high
probability uh no matter what a
malicious PR might try to do
